Articles.Content: What mod is it that let's you do things like put parts inside of other parts? Is there a mod that expands the way you place and move parts? I've seen ships with multiple intakes inside each other is that a mod or what???

Hit Alt-F12 while in the VAB to bring up the debug menu and then turn on part clipping.

::Edit for clarity:: You don't have to be in the VAB to access the menu. You can open the debug menu at any point in the game.

Edited August 29, 2013 by dave4002000
is it harder on the game if you use clipping? like does it make it have to work harder on loading the ships and will effect the frame rate or will it run just the same?
Not usually. Sometimes it can cause physics bugs so be cautious and try not to overuse it.
